text: The 1999 Primera B de Chile was the 49th completed season of the Primera B de Chile. Unión Española was tournament’s champion. ==First phase== ===League tables=== ==Second phase== Half of the first phase points were carried over as bonus points in the second phase. ===League table=== ==References== ==External links== * RSSSF 1999 Category:Primera B de Chile seasons Primera B Chil
title: 1999 Primera B de Chile
